searchDocs.title: RunnerParams​
searchDocs.content: RunnerParams are parameters for dynamic loading. You only need to define the following:  {DynamicLoad: Boolean, DynamicContainer: Instance}   warning DynamicContainer cannot be nil even if DynamicLoad is false!

searchDocs.title: Example Module​
searchDocs.content: Here is an example module.  --!strict local MyModule = {} MyModule.Init = function(tbl: ActiveRunner) print("foobar") print(tbl.Version) end return MyModule   As you can see, when calling Runner.new(), it passes the ActiveRunner to Init, this is for debugging and other stuff.

searchDocs.title: Introduction
searchDocs.content: Introduction You're probably wondering, What in the absolute godforsaken lord is Runner? Well, it's a Simple Module Loader™ that Just Works™, made for developers who are too lazy to make their own I guess. It's basically Adonis plugins, but not plugins. Again, you're probably wondering again, Why in the world should I use Runner? I just explained it dude. Made for lazy devs who cannot code competently.

searchDocs.title: IsEmpty​
searchDocs.content: </> Utilities.IsEmpty( tbl: {any}-- Table to check ) → boolean-- Is it empty? Checks if a table is empty

searchDocs.title: InitExists​
searchDocs.content: </> Utilities.InitExists( tbl: {any},-- Table to check arg: string-- Argument to check with ) → boolean-- Does arg exist in tbl? Checks if arg exists in tbl

searchDocs.title: ActiveRunner​
searchDocs.content: </> type ActiveRunner = string | Instance | {Instance } A base type for all ActiveRunners, contains the loaded modules, module container and version.

searchDocs.title: RunnerParams​
searchDocs.content: </> type RunnerParams = boolean | Instance  A type for the parameters of the Runner constructor.

searchDocs.title: new​
searchDocs.content: </> Runner.new( Modules: Instance ,-- The module container to load modules from Params: { DynamicLoad: boolean, DynamicContainer: Instance }-- Parameters for dynamic loading ) → ActiveRunner-- Returns a new ActiveRunner instance Creates a new ActiveRunner instance.
